subject: AI & Agents
title: User-Based Collaborative Filtering
description: A quick win: understand User-Based Collaborative Filtering.

hook.text: You and a stranger both loved the same 20 movies. Their 21st pick? Probably gold for you.

buildup.text: User-based CF finds similar users and recommends what they liked that you haven't seen.

discovery.text: Similarity measures: cosine similarity, Pearson correlation, or Jaccard index over ratings.

twist.text: With millions of users, computing all pairwise similarities is computationally expensive.

climax.text: User-based CF was pioneering but struggles with scaleâ€”item-based methods came next.

punchline.text: Birds of a feather watch together.
